lead_paragraph: SHAINSWIT--Lisa. Beloved mother and grandmother died peacefully on May 25 at age 93. Vibrant until her last days. Lisa leaves behind her children Carol and Joseph and her grandchildren Ashley and Gregory and son-in-law Stuart. A recognized artist and wife of the late George Shainswit. A renowned chess master. Lisa will be remembered for her beauty, wisdom and indomitable spirit. 1/3
